short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Github visible on every page in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub Sidepanel - Effortless Access to GitHub in Your Browser
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With the GitHub Sidepanel extension, managing repositories, exploring code, and tracking issues is easier than ever—right from your Chrome sidebar! This extension is designed for developers, project managers, and anyone working with GitHub who wants a seamless way to access GitHub’s full functionality without leaving their current workflow. Now you can view, edit, and monitor your projects while staying productive on other tasks.

Why Choose GitHub Sidepanel?
------------------------------------------------------
1. Quick, Convenient GitHub Access
Open GitHub with a single click in your Chrome side panel. No more jumping between tabs or interrupting your work to check on code updates, issues, or pull requests. Keep your GitHub activity instantly accessible and organized within your workflow.

2. Efficient Navigation
Whether you're reviewing code, merging pull requests, or keeping an eye on recent commits, GitHub Sidepanel streamlines the entire GitHub interface into a compact, user-friendly sidebar. Switch between repositories, navigate branches, and manage issues—all in one place.

3. Stay Productive
Ideal for developers and teams who need to monitor projects while working on multiple tasks. The GitHub Sidepanel lets you check notifications, view activity logs, and manage tasks on GitHub without ever leaving your current browser tab.

4. Real-Time Updates
Stay up-to-date with the latest commits, open issues, and pull requests. GitHub Sidepanel allows you to monitor changes and view updates as they happen, so you're always on top of your development work.

5. Organized and Efficient Workflow
Manage your repositories with greater efficiency by keeping GitHub accessible on the side of your screen. This side panel extension is designed to help you work smarter and streamline your development process with GitHub at your fingertips.

Key Features:
------------------------------------------------------
One-Click GitHub Access: Open GitHub instantly within your Chrome sidebar for easy access to all your repositories.

Complete Functionality: Navigate through code, review pull requests, track issues, and manage branches—all from the side panel.

Clean, Compact Layout: Enjoy a compact, optimized GitHub experience that provides easy access to essential tools without clutter.

Reliable and Lightweight: This extension is built for smooth performance, allowing you to run GitHub alongside other activities without slowing down your browser.

Boost your productivity and streamline your GitHub experience with GitHub Sidepanel—the essential tool for developers, coders, and project managers. Keep everything you need within reach, so you can code, collaborate, and manage your projects seamlessly. Try GitHub Sidepanel today and experience efficient project management right in your browser!
